product_name: Spy Raider Snow Goggles - Spy+POW Frame
long_description: With a large, view-maximizing cylindrical lens, the Spy Raider Spy+POW goggles deliver clear vision and come with a spare lens. As a bonus, each goggle sold contributes to Protect Our Winters (POW). $3 from each goggle sold goes towards POW environmental protection programs, which work to reduce climate change's effects on winter sports and local economies. Blue Contact lens has a blue tint with 45% visible light transmission (VLT) for good all-around performance in changing light conditions. Spare Bronze lens has a bronze tint with 24% VLT, delivering increased contrast in overcast, flat light conditions. Oversized cylindrical lens is designed to deliver wide peripheral vision so you can see more of the mountain; minimalist frame helps expand your viewable area. Double-layer thermal lens creates a thermal barrier between the cold outside air and the warm air next to your face, helping reduce fogging. Antifog and antiscratch lens treatments help keep your vision clear and distortion-free. Strategically placed frame vents increase airflow to reduce fogging; flexible polyurethane frame ensures a comfortable fit. 3-layer face foam is constructed of a dense base, a plush mid layer and a soft fleece top layer; design ensures a tight seal, good moisture management and maximum comfort. Wide adjustable strap is backed with silicone ribbing so it stays in place, whether you're wearing a helmet or not. Please note: though the Raider goggles come with a spare lens, the frame is not optimized for fast lens changes; some caution and effort will be necessary to change lenses.
